attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: This app has got to be one of the worst things ever to reside in my cell phone. When I downloaded it, my phone immediately crashed. I had to go to the Apple Store to get it fixed, which cost me my precious money and time. When the phone finally began working again, I opened the app in order to find out when the next rally would be. Instead of any helpful information, I was instead greeted with some terribly inappropriate photos of the President, along with a slideshow titled â€œMy Best Tweets That Show What a Great Leader and Articulate Speaker I Am Iâ€™m the Best President America Has Ever Seen Vote For Me Not Sleepy Joe.â€ Very unprofessional and rude. I cannot believe I downloaded this filth. If i could give less than one star I would.
attributes.title: Terrible experience!

attributes.review: The president of the United States needs to be held at a much higher standard if he wants to actually make America â€œGreatâ€ but right now this app just proves how bad he is at doing that. The surveys are completely biased and therefore creates skewed data that should not be reputable to any degree. When it come to the app itself, it is extremely slow, taking 30 minutes just to download the app let alone the 10 hours it took to finally get signed in. Personally I believe something that spreads such false information should not be advertised and/or available for download in the United States because it is harmful to the citizens as well as our reputation around the rest of the world. 0/10 would never recommend.

attributes.review: After the three hour download time, I tried to open the app only for it to turn off my phone. Standard issues.  But it got worse. I started getting hundreds of notifications about â€œtweetsâ€ and â€œtrumpâ€. Who even is that guy? Some of the worst days of my life came from this app, I think it may promote devil worship. All my photos were deleted along with my apps, with the exception of the standard apps and the Trump app. All of this happened away from my home. Apparently this app tells everyone where I live, because my house had been ransacked. Doors were torn off their hinges, all my money was gone, and they slit my dogs throat. My dog is dead. That were all I had. My life is ruined and itâ€™s all this apps fault.
